mapper.select: select b.title, b.content, b.user_no userNo from users u, board b where u.no = b.user_no and b.no= #{bno}

select rn, no, title, reg_date regDate, hit, user_no userNo, name from (select rownum rn, no, title, reg_date, hit, user_no, name from (select b.no, b.title, to_char(b.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') reg_date, b.hit, b.user_no, u.name from users u, board b where u.no = b.user_no order by reg_date desc, no desc)) where rn>#{boardMinNum} and rn<=#{boardMaxNum}

select rn, no, title, reg_date regDate, hit, user_no userNo, name from (select rownum rn, no, title, reg_date, hit, user_no, name from (select b.no, b.title, to_char(b.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') reg_date, b.hit, b.user_no, u.name from users u, board b where u.no = b.user_no and b.title like #{keyWord} order by reg_date desc, no desc)) where rn>#{boardMinNum} and rn<=#{boardMaxNum}

select rn, no, title, reg_date regDate, hit, user_no userNo, name from (select rownum rn, no, title, reg_date, hit, user_no, name from (select b.no, b.title, to_char(b.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') reg_date, b.hit, b.user_no, u.name from users u, board b where u.no = b.user_no and (b.title like #{keyWord} or b.content like #{keWword}) order by reg_date desc, no desc)) where rn>#{boardMinNum} and rn<=#{boardMaxNum}

select rn, no, title, reg_date regDate, hit, user_no userNo, name from (select rownum rn, no, title, reg_date, hit, user_no, name from (select b.no, b.title, to_char(b.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') reg_date, b.hit, b.user_no, u.name from users u, board b where u.no = b.user_no and u.name like #{keyWord} order by reg_date desc, no desc)) where rn>#{boardMinNum} and rn<=#{boardMaxNum}
